meanings.definition: A serovar is a variant of a microorganism distinguished by its specific antigens.
meanings.sent1: Scientists are studying a new serovar of bacteria found in the water.
meanings.sent2: The lab identified the serovar of the virus causing the outbreak.
meanings.sent3: The serovar of the germ threw a party for all its antigens.
meanings.sent4: In the world of microorganisms, each serovar is like a unique fingerprint.
meanings.sent5: The specific antigens of the serovar made it stand out in the research.

meanings.definition: Serovar can refer to a group of microorganisms with similar antigenic properties.
meanings.sent1: The serovar of bacteria in the soil helps with decomposition.
meanings.sent2: Researchers are comparing the serovars of different strains to understand their similarities.
meanings.sent3: At the microorganism party, the serovar group stuck together like glue.
meanings.sent4: The serovar family tree branches out into various antigenic similarities.
meanings.sent5: In the lab, they are analyzing the serovar cluster for any unique properties.
